projectName: Mobility Journey - Tests & Code Quality (Review & Fix)
description: Review PR #2 code quality. Run all tests, check for issues, fix anything broken. Ensure typecheck + lint + tests all pass clean.

userStories.title: Run full quality checks and fix failures
userStories.description: Run bun run typecheck, bun run lint, and bun run test. Fix any failures. All three must pass clean. Check for unused imports, dead code, missing types.

userStories.title: Review test quality and coverage
userStories.description: Review all test files. Ensure tests are meaningful (not just smoke tests). Add missing edge cases. Ensure mocks are realistic. Tests should actually validate behavior, not just render without crashing.

userStories.title: Code review fixes
userStories.description: Review all changed files for: security issues, error handling gaps, accessibility issues, performance problems, code style inconsistencies. Fix anything found.
